case.state: Hehe, I'm that obvious, huh?
This isn't exactly what I had in mind when I suggested towel treatment.
Gee, you sure came to play, ~player~! Although I think you gotta let us strip you first...
Kyoko! Now this is a nice surprise!
Kyoko! I probably should have expected poker would tickle your fancy.
Heya! I'm Aoi Asahina, but my friends just call me Hina. 'Sup?
Hehe, I'm that obvious, huh?
Ah, Kyoko! Fancy seeing you here!
Chihiro! Boy am I glad to see you again!
Must have been too much for her...
Wait-- oh well! Let's meet again some other time!
And there she goes. Always on the move, I guess!
Kyoko and... Kyouko? What in the world is going on?
To be honest, I never would have expected you to be up for something like this. You were always the shy one in our class.
Oh, right! everyone, this is my old friend, Kyoko! We were classmates back at Hope's Peak.
Huh? Kyoko, was it? Wait a minute...

Wow, a place for me to swim!
Well, after this game of course, Haha!
Makoto! What a great name! I once had a classmate named Makoto! You two would totally get along!
This is cool! Even the locker room is set up like a big game room!
And don't try to throw me off with some special motive!
Talk about a class reunion! I never expected it would go like this, but I guess I'll roll with it!
Everyone watch your backs! I'm gonna break some records today!
I'm more brawn than brains, so don't expect much from me!
Glad to meet ya, everyone!
I don't plan to lose! Bring it on!
I'm all in!
Take them all!
It's a big risk, but I'm going big or going home!
Not worth it. I'll keep this hand.
I'll keep the hand. That's a good idea, right?
You kidding? This is a great hand!
~Cards.text~!
Gimme ~cards.text~!
I'll go with ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
Uh... I guess ~cards.text~!
Alright, I've got it! I'll swap ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
I'm feeling lucky! ~cards.text~ card~cards.ifplural(s|)~.
Hmm, this time I will swap ~cards.text~.
Err, maybe I shouldn't have said that out loud.
Yeah, I think I'm good for now.
I've got this!
Wow, I'm even luckier than I thought!
With a hand like this, I can freestyle the next round!
Alright! Talk about dodging a bullet!
Wow, thanks, dealer!
You may have noticed that I saved my energy for the last lap.
Awesome, just as I planned!
Wow, already?
Yep, totally meant to do that!
Would you look at that? Guess I'm not done yet!
Oh man... Oh man...!
Hey, that's better!
I guess I need to believe in myself more.
All these luck factors remind me of the Mono-Mono machine back at school. Remember that thing? You put in a coin and you get a random card out of it.
If anything, I'm glad you don't have to roll any gacha machines to get special cards.
Works for me!
I don't see myself losing this round, even with this hand.
Aw man, if I lose this round, there's no defense.
What, you think I'm just going to reveal my strategy?
I'm running out of things to strip. I'll have to do even better...
Hmm... alright, I can live with this.
Yeah, this is good enough.
This is good enough, at least, I hope it is!
(C'mon, ~player~, mess up!)
At this stage in the game, I can't afford to keep getting average hands.
I won't get anywhere if I keep settling for average!
Where's Makoto when you need him?
Well who could have seen that coming? Haha!
On second thought, I'll undo that...
It'd be easier to do 50 backstroke laps than land something good.
I'd toss these into the ocean if I could.
C'mon dealer...
Yipe! This might be the end!
Looks like this is the end. Oh well, it was fun while it lasted.
Aha... Yeah, I'm probably done for.
No, it can't be...
Well, you sure knocked my socks off this time... even though my socks are already off.
Gotta say, it's a bit annoying how much luck matters here...
These are normal rules right? No special gimmicks or anything?
...Am I reading these right?
I've done all I can...
Darnn, that didn't work.
Trying to win a round with a hand like this is like swimming all the way to Hokkaido!
Ah-- well, that sure didn't work...
Really giving me the cold shoulder, aren't you?
Looks like you're gonna see even more skin, ~player~.
Ugh, tell me about it...
Get outta town, Kyoko! You really knew?
No way! Could it be that Chihiro likes it when guys fawn for her?!
Haven't you noticed how standoff-ish Chihiro is with girls, yet she turns on the charm around guys?
You didn't have to keep it a secret, Chihiro! We're your classmates-- well, we were, anyway.
Is that why you were so shy around us, Chihiro? Gee, now I wish I knew sooner.
I never would have expected to play card games against a computer.
Crazy to think how much we've done after graduation! We should keep this up!
What's your name again? ~player~, right? Got it! I'll hammer it into my head!
~Player~... ~Player~... There we go! If you want to remember someone's name, write it on your palm three times!
"The opposite of possible isn't impossible-- it's challenge!" That's a quote from the famous baseball player Jackie Robinson!
"A person's ability is measured by the power they display at the point where pressure is applied." That's a quote from Kenji Jojima of the Seattle Mariners!
What, me? Nervous? Hah! Can you imagine?
Kyoko! It's like you read my mind!
You're right, I guess that would make it easier, huh?
To be honest, I can't believe I made it this far either! I thought for sure I would be down to my underwear by now.
No way! I thought I would do better than that!
Let me show you how the Ultimate Swimming Pro gets things done!
Here, I'll tell ya about something I call the towel treatment!
Damn, can't say I didn't see this coming. But that's OK! I thrive on challenges! More and more stuff to try...!
OK, but uh... don't stare, OK?
So far it's been a pretty easy game. Should we have picked something else?
Can't win them all, right?
No one's going easy on me, are they?
One last extra thing to go: my leg band.
I can't catch a break, can I?
Oh, my turn? Uh, of course! No worries!
Hm, let's see, I guess I better take my socks off now.
Oh, I lost again? Alright, guess I'll pick something.
Wow, this game is tough!
Man, what a bummer.
Not my day, huh?
Whether you're swimming or playing card games, you always gotta be wary of sharks.
Whatever, I can live with this loss!
Aw man, me again?
Do I have to? ...No! I gotta think positive!
Oh no!
Me? But I thought I was doing fine!
Don't worry, I thrive under pressure.
That's what I should have done; wear my swimsuit to this.
Oh, are you referring to... you know?
Now that I think of it, none of my female classmates wore shorts. I was hoping I could be somewhat of a trend setter.
It's very handy when you want to protect your knee from dirt. I have it with me whenever I'm working out on land.
I may be a swimmer, but that doesn't mean I don't like running now and then. These sneakers haven't let me down yet!
There's no better time than now. I'll remove my sneakers to get us started.
Before anyone asks, I didn't hide a card in my leg band. I wouldn't have a use for it, anyway.
You go out to the balcony, strip completely naked, and you really feel the wind!
This is the jacket most of my classmates recognized me in back at Hope's Peak. I tend to wear it everywhere, even in the classroom.
I bet you're wondering how I became the Ultimate Swimmer. I've always been a pretty athletic kid, but swimming was the sport where I started breaking records.
You know, I was always a competitive kid. I participated in six different sports, but swimming was my prima-donna.
You wanna know why I love to compete so much? It's not about winning, but having to fight and struggle and give it all you got to reach the top.
I didn't bring my boxers today, just my panties. And when I show them, it's kinda... embarrassing.
Look at us, Mahiru! We're like two peas in a pod!
In my birthday suit already...
I wouldn't be surprised. You were never one to pay attention to our boobies.
As brilliant as ever, Kyoko!
Hehe! There's no hiding from the top of our class!
I wouldn't even need to worry about it today! The pool deck is as clean as can be!
Actually this feels nice! I miss the feeling of having my toes buried in the sand!
You should have seen me in the sports festival! I would have taken the lead in the relay race if Monokuma didn't ruin everything!
So where are my tiddy lovers at?
The biggest piece is out! Not only can I move more freely, but it'll only get harder from here!
But for now, let's forget all that silly junk about sexy things or whatever.
But I don't think I have to worry now. This place seems pretty clean.
Hm, I should have brought sandals!
It feels amazing! I never let a morning pass without a good rub down!
It's important to take your losses in stride. Even the greatest champions had to lose a lot to get where they are.
I was even scouted to be an Olympic cadet! I honestly can't believe I pulled that off.
But no fret. My sleeves aren't too special. I have lots of them back at home!
I couldn't imagine replacing it. Not even for a suit and tie.
Even if I were to work for some hardcore organization hellbent on protecting mankind, you couldn't make me take it off..
Take a good look! Fit as a fiddle!
When you finally reach that goal, it's just...lonely. It's lonely at the top, ya know?
Although, I wasn't embarrassed before. But now I kinda am. I wonder how come...
Hey, what are you doing? You're not supposed to see this message! Better report it to the writer!
Yay! Ultra stoked!
I'm getting totally fired up!
Oh, what's ~name~ gonna take off?
Thanks for taking the hit, ~name~.
Yes, ~name~ lost!
Safe!
Another lap finished!
Come on, ~name~! You've got this!
You know what they say, ~target~! The only difference between try and triumph is a little oomph.
Jeez, just don't make this harder than it has to be...
All it takes is one bad hand...
Yeah, that's it. Embrace your body.
C'mon, ~name~! The water's nice and warm!
Now this will surely be interesting to watch!
You've still got more stripping to go!
A tie? Wait, what happens then?
Wow, a tie! I didn't even think it was possible!
Just going with your ~clothing~...?
But it's so small! I barely even noticed it!
I don't get the point of all that extra stuff. They'll only slow you down.
Well, surely you can do better than that!
That barely even counts. You're just sliding something off.
Boring! Come on, ~name~!
Was this your strategy all along?
Aw man, I was hoping you would show me a little mercy...
OK, now you're just rubbing it in.
Wow, ~player~, I can't explain it but you've developed this aura around you.
Talk about unsportsmanlike...
Could someone remind me how many rounds we're playing?
Well this is... this is a start for sure.
I'll win this game, one round at a time!
It's a small win, but it's still a win!
Well, it's not like I can do anything about it...
There should be a rule which doesn't allow small items like your ~clothing~. You know, to make it less boring.
Just going with your ~clothing~...?
But it's so small! I barely even noticed it!
I don't get the point of all that extra stuff. They'll only slow you down.
Well, surely you can do better than that!
That barely even counts. You're just sliding something off.
Boring! Come on, ~name~!
Was this your strategy all along?
Aw man, I was hoping you would show me a little mercy...
OK, now you're just rubbing it in.
Wow, ~player~, I can't explain it but you've developed this aura around you.
Talk about unsportsmanlike...
Call it a hunch, but you're probably going to win.
Could someone remind me how many rounds we're playing?
Well this is... this is a start for sure.
I'll win this game, one round at a time!
It's a small win, but it's still a win!
Well, it's not like I can do anything about it...
There should be a rule which doesn't allow small items like your ~clothing~. You know, to make it less boring.
That's a good choice! Looks like I'm still doing okay, too.
Well then, now it's starting to feel like a big get together!
...So what's your type, ~player~? What kind of girls do you like?
Don't worry about me, ~target~! I've done all I could!
Seems like we haven't lost direction yet!
Let's keep going!
Oh well, I'll get the rest of your clothing off too!
Your loss is my win!
Hey, you're gonna have to take off more sooner or later!
You're doing fine! Certainly better than me!
Nice play! ...I think.
Uh... oh! Aren't you that one magazine? I remember seeing my classmate Junko Enoshima in it.
That's a good choice! Looks like I'm still doing okay, too.
Well then, now it's starting to feel like a big get together!
...So what's your type, ~player~? What kind of girls do you like?
Don't worry about me, ~target~! I've done all I could!
Seems like we haven't lost direction yet!
Actually, nah, I'd hate to put you on the spot like that.
Let's keep going!
Oh well, I'll get the rest of your clothing off too!
Your loss is my win!
Hey, you're gonna have to take off more sooner or later!
You're doing fine! Certainly better than me!
Nice play! ...I think.
Doesn't seem too out of the ordinary. I was on a swim team after all.
You really have your heart in this, don’t you?
Even though I'm out, this is making for a nice treat!
Alright, ~name~, you made it.
In the sports world, this is crunch time! Time to make a hype play!
This will do just fine!
If the game keeps going like this, I'll win for sure!
You should go out like that more often, ~name~.
(I'll definitely need to keep my eye on him...)
Hey, wouldn't it be funny if someone else took ~clothing~ off for him?
Doesn't seem too out of the ordinary. I was on a swim team after all.
You really have your heart in this, don’t you?
Whoa, such a fast-paced game!
Are you sure? That covers a lot of skin.
Keep your head in the game, ~name~, or you'll never win!
Even though I'm out, this is making for a nice treat!
Alright, ~name~, you made it.
Y-your ~clothing~? Good choice!
Take it off, take it off!
Gimme, some skin, ~target~!
You should go out like that more often, ~name~.
(I'll definitely need to keep my eye on her...)
Hey, wouldn't it be funny if someone else took ~clothing~ off for her?
Thanks for the extra motivation!
You know I won't let you beat me, ~name~!
In the sports world, this is crunch time! Time to make a hype play!
This will do just fine!
If the game keeps going like this, I'll win for sure!
You don't have much more left, huh?
I think I'm starting to see this game a bit differently...
Oh, are you already taking your ~clothing~ off, ~name~?
No way he's going for his ~clothing~ already!
Can't say I didn't see this coming.
Are you ready? Let’s see it.
C'mon, dude! Put your back into it!
I wish us girls could go topless like the guys can. Like, they're just titties, right?
(Well that's one way to put it!)
...Moving right along!
Not much else left, huh, ~name~?
You realize I'm a swimmer, right, ~target~? I'm used to this.
I may have lost, but at least the views are nice.
Good stuff, ~name~.
Damn, dude. I like what I’m seeing.
The game has gotten this far, huh...
Oh fuck, he's gonna go for it!
Ah, sorry! I didn't mean to stare! Wait, you don't mind, do you?
Well, I guess it was inevitable.
Don't over think it and just show us!
(Even Chihiro's is bigger than that...)
That wasn't as exciting as I was hoping.
Oh wow, it's even smaller than I thought!
I-I'm not sure how I'm supposed to react. Er, I mean.. nice penis, I guess.
Hmm... nope! Can't think of a single thing this is good for!
Disappointed! Ultra disappointed!
Just like I imagined it...
Not bad at all, ~target~.
Whoa, it's like, really cute! Could I touch it?
No way, that doesn't even look real!
Whoa! I uh... wasn't prepared for that...
(Don't let it distract you. Focus on the game.)
It's huge!
O-okay, I'll admit you got some impressive size.
Go on... we're waiting...
Looks like you're all out of breath, ~name~! Now I'm gonna zip into the lead!
This game is more exciting than I thought!
Maybe I'll brag to my brother when I get back. I can already see him getting super jealous.
How could you not be romantic about this game?
It's not about the size of the dog in the fight, but the size of the fight in the dog!
That wasn't as exciting as I was hoping.
Huh, I barely even noticed them. Isn't that funny?
Uh, yeah! I like them, ~name~!
Having fun yet? I sure am!
Ah, yes! The queen accepts this royal tribute! Just kidding!
Hey, not bad! But you still have room to grow!
No matter how good you could get, you could always get better!
Any set is nice, but yours just hit different!
Now that you don't see every day!
Way to show them off, ~name~!
Woohoo! This is why we play the game!
Guess that's another reason to stay until the end of the game!
Wow! I can't help but feel impressed!
Big titty gang!
This is kind of...intense, ~target~. I mean, it's not really what I was expecting...
I'd like to see how you could top this, ~name~.
Yeah, this will do.
Sorry if I stared too much, ~name~.
Wow, ~name~! You're like a pro at this!
Ooh! Looking cool, ~name~!
Let's see what you got, Kyoko! ...Sorry, I meant the other Kyouko!
Wow! Another swimmer? You must be top of your class! I gotta see you in action!
So hold on. Are you guys bound by fate or something?
Hey Chiaki, do you play any games where you have to move around a bunch? You know, like the ones at arcades where you dance or shoot guns or have to grip handles!
(Chihiro's always closed herself off from the rest of us. It would be interesting to see a little bit more into her.)
(Come to think of it, I never saw Chihiro show any skin, not even in gym class. It would be interesting to see her little by little.)
I see! So you do mess up sometimes, Kyoko! Then again, I don't think even you could affect luck in your favor.
You're just a ball of energy, aren't ya? We could have used someone like you in class 78.
Man! Thanks to him, I don't feel like chilling out in the pool anymore.
Yahoo! One step closer to victory!
Well you know what they say about life giving you lemons!
Phew! I really dodged a bullet there!
You can tell how a match is going to go by the tone that's set in the first round!
15 rounds! That's gotta be good for a new record, right?
Hey, what's the record for longest win streak? I think I might have beat it.
Hang on, guys! I'll be back!
I think what he means is that you only really see how strong a person is when they're under pressure. I wonder how strong I can be...
And I live to see another round!
Sorry, ~target~, rules are rules!
I'm doing pretty well today, huh? I wouldn't mind another doughnut or two to celebrate...
Shh! Kyoko! We don't talk about that name!

W-wait! Chihiro!
*sigh* Poor gal...
Huh? What could she possibly be doing?
Huh? Isn't she just stripping?
I may have seen you naked, but seeing you strip right in front of me, I never would have imagined.
Even in the locker rooms you always stripped in private. I gotta savor this.
Looks like you need more training, ~target~!
Whatever floats your boat, ~name~.
Alright, I'll let it slide. Like a water slide... *chuckle*
N-no wait! That wasn't what I meant!
Hey wait! That's not the mood I was referring to!
How come you brought your swimming clothes to a card game? I mean, I would have brought mine otherwise.
If it were up to me, I'd just wear sandals everywhere.
Your feet will thank you later.
Oh, I get it. You want to start out slow rather than jump out of the starting line.
Hey! You're not even stripping anything!
Just going with your ~clothing~...?
But it's so small! I barely even noticed it!
I don't get the point of all that extra stuff. They'll only slow you down.
Well, surely you can do better than that!
That barely even counts. You're just sliding something off.
~blank~
Remember, ~name~, this is just a challenge. You can't give up!
And I see ~name~ knows exactly what to do! Way to get the ball rolling!
Boring! Come on, ~name~!
Was this your strategy all along?
Aw man, I was hoping you would show me a little mercy...
Kyaa! Z-zombie!!
Well, she did have her sister direct some attention to her. So we were talking about her without even realizing it.
Huh...? You mean... oh my god!
That voice-- that tone and... everything! Is that you, Chihiro?
As beautiful as ever! I'd feel guilty hogging that view all to myself!
Great, now I'm going to be distracted the whole game!
Ugh! Fine! But you better take something off next time you lose!
Ah, much better. I've never been great at killing time, aha!
I'm back! Did anything happen while I was gone?
Well, you're gonna wish you did, ~name~! Once I get started, it's not easy to catch me!
Leave it to me! I'll come up with the perfect remedy to make you fit as a fiddle!
I'm back! Check this out, ~player~! I found this interesting item
Whoa, you really were in a hurry, weren't you?
Oh, don't worry. You'll be fine!
Towel Treatment is one thing, but, this turns things on its head!
Welcome to the loser's side, I guess.
W-wow, Chihiro! How are you so good at this? Have you been practicing this whole time?
So this is how boys do it, huh?
Y-you're really going at it!
Do you really need to be so aggro about it?
Yes, that's it. Set it up so I can knock it down. Just kidding!
It's actually a little hard to see with your hand in the way.
You're pretty strong, you know that? It makes me really glad to know you for all these years.
Hey, don't make a mess over there! I'll charge a cleaning fee!
Just a bit outside! You need better aim than that, ~name~!
Just watching that only makes this easier...
Okay, ~target~. It's the bottom of the 9th, two outs, and you got a woman on third. It's hero time!
G-good luck, ~name~! No pressure!
And it's a home run! *chuckle*
Did I... provide a good example?
Well, I'm sure I'll learn a lot just by watching.
You really don't mind that we can all see you?
You're good, but not good enough to affect me, ~name~!
A-are you having fun too, ~name~?
Go, ~name~, go!
Kinda feels like we're having sex, but not really.
Did that feel good, ~name~?
Okay I'll admit it. This is amazing.
Wow... I'm actually getting jealous.
That was a really cute face, ~name~...
Wonderful...
How did you do that? You know... just now?
Seems like I got much to learn.
There's no way you learned this on the spot!
Booyah! You must be exhausted after that, so go and rest up!
Hey, dealer! You werent rigging the deck, were you?
No way! The deck is stacked! It's gotta be!
Oh, I'm first?! A-alright! I'll show you just what I can do!
Looks like I'm out! I hope you're all ready! I'm going to do this like only Aoi Asahina can!
Ehe, sure, whatever you say, Kyoko...
Thank goodness for that! You never let me down yet, Kyoko. Ehehe...
Yeah, I guess you'd know that better than anyone, Kyoko!
Man, that was close! Couldn't force overtime after all.
Sorry, ~player~, but you did invite me here, so I gotta make do.
Seems like things didn't go my way this time. I'll just have to make do, then. Let's rock 'n' roll!
Don't mind if I do! I've always said action spoke louder than words!
(I think I'll do fine. After all, if ~tomboy~ could do it, so can I.)
(I say that, but all I've ever been good at are sports and physical stuff! This is taking it to the next level!)
(What am I going to do? I'm not ladylike enough for this!)
Sheesh. If this happens a lot then count me out!
A close friend once told me it's all about having fun, even when you're not competing.
Bear with me, everyone. Even a world class athlete has firsts.
I may have competed in front of large crowds, but I never did anything like this before, so I'll try not to bore you!
Kyoko being here makes me more confident.
Hehe, how thoughtful! This is why I like you, Kyoko!
(It's so frustrating. Even after my practice runs with Makoto, I still don't feel good enough!)
(Come to think of it, what did Makoto say that one time? That I'm just fine as I am?)
(...Something like that. He also said I shouldn't push it and just have fun falling in love.)
(Yeah, I can't really argue with that. I do love him after all...)
Oh, t-there...
Oh... this feels good...
I see, so if I rub in this spot, it feels even better.
Ah, hah...
Why, why is it... better...
Ah! I must be close!
It tickles!
Alright guys, here it comes!
I think I can feel it coming now...
Gaaah!
Oh yeah!
Whew! That was amazing! I feel like I have a huge weight lifted off my chest! And on top of that... I kinda had fun doing it in front of everyone!
Now that's what I call a photo finish!
So? What did everyone think? I sure went the distance there!
I hope you're happy with that! I couldn't imagine going again...
Y-you're still staring at me? Am I really that much of a mess?
Um, this-- didn't bother you too much did it, Chihiro?
You know what would be great right now? One of those ice cream sandwiches they sell at the local beach. I never let a swimming session end without them!
Gaaah! I can't control my body anymore! I need to move like crazy! Like, jump into the water right now!
Then again, ~player~ was kind enough to invite me out here. I shouldn't just think about myself.
I don't know if I can wait this long. I wanna swim. I wanna swim! I super duper wanna SWIM!
I'm not just good at swimming, ya know. You name a water sport, I'll tell you how awesome I am at it!
There's no way I can recharge my batteries in a tiny room like this! I need to get outside and run around!
It's a nice day, isn't it? Birds are singing, flowers are blooming... maybe I should swim for a bit.
Would anyone be up for a swim after this game? ...No? Just me? That's alright! I don't mind going solo!
Hmm, I wonder what Toko's been doing. I haven't heard from her since graduation. Maybe I should text her.
...Yeah, I got nothing.
Well, I dunno about you, but I'm hitting up the closest donut shop after this! I can figure out the rest from there!
Good game, Chihiro. You ready to head back?
No way! Did I actually beat Kyoko?!
Champion of everything! That's me!
Looks like I can add poker to my ever growing list of sports expertise.
Oh man, I had so much fun! I completely lost track of time back there!
Thanks for inviting me, ~player~! I had so much fun, I forgot to eat! So now I need to take down a nice big meal!
This sets me up to recognize the player in subsequent games.
Looks like you win, Kyoko. I wouldn't have expected anything less from you.
For real? Skinny dipping with Kirigiri and our new friend? I love it! Count me in!
Skinny dipping? That sounds so legit! Hope you can keep up with me, though!
You wanna hang out again, Chihiro? Now that we know the truth, I got something in mind for you!
I guess this is goodbye. But hey! We might as well say it with smiles on our faces!
Wow, that was over sooner than I thought! Now c'mon, the water's waiting!
Wait, really, ~player~? You wanna swim too? ALRIGHT! Don't leave me waiting!
I'll get you next time! Just invite me again!
You know, I wouldn't mind doing this again! Got it, ~player~? Next time you wanna play strip games, you know who to call!
I gotta do some more training. Maybe I'll talk to Sakura-- oh! Or maybe Celeste! She's great at card games.
This sets me up to recognize the player in subsequent games.
Unlocks Aoi's underwear.
